full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement
=================================================================

**Tender Title:** E6MON-23PQEP - Period 03 - Miscellaneous Grocery Products

**Reference Number:** WS3976528407-Doc3983050926

**Publication Date:** January 5, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** February 1, 2024, at 2 PM EST

**Procedure:** Competitive Bidding

**Request Type:** Request for Standing Offer

**Notice Type:** Open Call for Bids

**Description:** 
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to submit offers for the acquisition of miscellaneous grocery products located in Quebec. The procurement is detailed in Annex A of the tender documents.

**Financial Criteria:** 
The selection criterion for this procurement is the lowest price.

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender is covered by the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

**Eligibility:**
To be eligible, bidders must ensure that their tender submission is received by the deadline of February 1, 2024, at 2 PM EST. Any bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

**Tender Documents:**
Tender documents, including Annex A of the notice, will be available for download on the Ariba website. Please refer to the notice URL provided below for details.

**Notice URL:**
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17361655?extsite=MTczNjE2NTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Contact Information:**
For any inquiries, please contact:

Selina Ly
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Phone: [None]
Email: selina.ly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
